title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 891.1 - Intent and applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 891.1 - Intent and applicability

State Regulations
(a) It is
the intent of the commission that the rules contained in this Part comply with
the provisions of
47
U.S.C. section
546
relative to franchise
renewals. Except as otherwise provided, these rules shall apply to the renewal
of every cable television franchise. No renewal of any franchise shall be
effective unless it is approved by the commission pursuant to section
222
of the

Public Service Law. An application for approval of a renewal shall comply with

Part 897 of this Title provided, however, that the filing of a timely
application pursuant to Part 897 of this Title shall, without further action, extend the applicant's operating rights pending final commission
action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
891.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
